title: Question regarding New Graves Passive

replies.body: I would assume its only I.E. specific. Cuz of the I.E.'s unique passive where it makes crits do 250% dmg. So it would make sense that only this item gives graves the extra 2 bullets
The way I would assume rito would make it work is that there is a threshold. every 25% damage adds an extra bullet.  The way its actually handled, who knows!
